name: AllDnDItemIcons
title: All D&D Item Icons
description: This module contains icons in SVG-format for all (non magical) items in the categories Adventuring Gear, Ammunition, Armour, Food and Drink, Gaming Sets, Instruments, Spellcasting foci, Tools, Kits, and Artisan Tools, Trade Good, Vehicles, and Weapons, from the Player's Handbook, and Dungeon Master's Guide, plus some waifs and strays from other books.
